description:
XCOM 2 is the sequel to the acclaimed turn-based tactics game about defending earth from an alien invasion.
Outwit your enemy on the battlefield and beyond, hunt the powerful Chosen, and build up an unstoppable
resistance to save humanity from the occupation of the Elders!"

0.1.0-alpha.description:
[Game Info](https://github.com/MaxReinstadler/X2WOTCArchipelago/blob/main/worlds/x2wotc/docs/en_XCOM%202%20War%20of%20the%20Chosen.md) | [Setup Guide](https://github.com/MaxReinstadler/X2WOTCArchipelago/blob/main/worlds/x2wotc/docs/setup_en.md)

### This is very early in development, not balanced for AP Multiworlds and most likely pretty broken.

This release is mostly for testing. Use at your own discretion.
0.1.0-alpha.title: 0.1.0 Alpha - First Release

0.10.0-beta.description:
[Game Info](https://github.com/MaxReinstadler/X2WOTCArchipelago/blob/main/worlds/x2wotc/docs/en_XCOM%202%20War%20of%20the%20Chosen.md) | [Setup Guide](https://github.com/MaxReinstadler/X2WOTCArchipelago/blob/main/worlds/x2wotc/docs/setup_en.md) | [Troubleshooting](https://github.com/MaxReinstadler/X2WOTCArchipelago/blob/main/worlds/x2wotc/docs/troubleshooting.md)

**NOTE:** The accompanying mod release is breaking! To prevent Steam workshop's automatic update from breaking ongoing multiworlds, it is highly recommended that you [manually install](https://github.com/MaxReinstadler/X2WOTCArchipelago/blob/main/worlds/x2wotc/docs/mod_manual_installation.md) the previous version [(0.9.0)](https://github.com/MaxReinstadler/WOTCArchipelago/releases/tag/0.9.0-beta) of the mod.
## Changes
### New Options
- Shuffle all scripted and procedural enemy encounters with new `Enemy Rando` option
  - Enemies that show up much earlier or later than usual will have some of their stats adjusted
- Enable `partial` or `full` automatic hints for research project locations in the lab and shadow chamber with new `Research Project Hints` option
  - `partial` hints will only reveal item classifications
  - Can be changed in-game via MCM
- Split Chosen weapon techs into `two` or `three` fragments each with new `Chosen Weapon Fragments` option
  - This should make it less likely for powerful Chosen weapons to trivialize some of the early game
- Added `RifleTech+` and `ArmorTech+` to existing `Progressive Items` option
  - `RifleTech+` overrides `RifleTech` and additionally includes `[Tech] Modular Weapons`
  - `ArmorTech+` overrides `ArmorTech` and additionally includes `[Tech] Hybrid Materials`
### Miscellaneous
- Added `archipelago.json` manifest file required from Archipelago version 0.7.0 onward
- Improved version checking between world, client, and mod
  - Added "Client Disconnected" and "Version Incompatible" in-game warning popups
- Clarified UI for all research poject and covert action locations
- Various optimizations that should noticeably improve generation times
- Various changes to logic and item classifications
- Renamed `Andromedon Suit` to `Andromedon Shell` (after thorough deliberation)
0.10.0-beta.title: 0.10.0 Beta

0.10.1-beta.description:
[Game Info](https://github.com/MaxReinstadler/X2WOTCArchipelago/blob/main/worlds/x2wotc/docs/en_XCOM%202%20War%20of%20the%20Chosen.md) | [Setup Guide](https://github.com/MaxReinstadler/X2WOTCArchipelago/blob/main/worlds/x2wotc/docs/setup_en.md) | [Troubleshooting](https://github.com/MaxReinstadler/X2WOTCArchipelago/blob/main/worlds/x2wotc/docs/troubleshooting.md)
## Changes
### New Option
- Added `Enemy Plando`
  - See the option description in the yaml for more info on usage
### Modding Support
- Mods can now override `location_table` entries during `generate_early` by calling `loc_manager.replace`/`item_manager.replace`
  - Mutable item data fields are `power`, `classification` and `tags`
  - Mutable location data fields are `difficulty` and `tags`
### Miscellaneous
- Changed `Alien Hunters DLC` option default to `none`
- Some early game enemy rando balance changes
0.10.1-beta.title: 0.10.1 Beta

0.10.10-beta.description:
[Game Info](https://github.com/MaxReinstadler/X2WOTCArchipelago/blob/main/worlds/x2wotc/docs/en_XCOM%202%20War%20of%20the%20Chosen.md) | [Setup Guide](https://github.com/MaxReinstadler/X2WOTCArchipelago/blob/main/worlds/x2wotc/docs/setup_en.md) | [APWorld Mods](https://github.com/MaxReinstadler/X2WOTCArchipelago/blob/main/worlds/x2wotc/docs/apworld_mods.md) |  [Troubleshooting](https://github.com/MaxReinstadler/X2WOTCArchipelago/blob/main/worlds/x2wotc/docs/troubleshooting.md)
## Changes
### Bug Fixes
- Fixed `start_inventory` and `start_inventory_from_pool` options
0.10.10-beta.title: 0.10.10 Beta

0.10.2-beta.description:
[Game Info](https://github.com/MaxReinstadler/X2WOTCArchipelago/blob/main/worlds/x2wotc/docs/en_XCOM%202%20War%20of%20the%20Chosen.md) | [Setup Guide](https://github.com/MaxReinstadler/X2WOTCArchipelago/blob/main/worlds/x2wotc/docs/setup_en.md) | [Troubleshooting](https://github.com/MaxReinstadler/X2WOTCArchipelago/blob/main/worlds/x2wotc/docs/troubleshooting.md)
# DO NOT USE THIS RELEASE!
Logic is fully broken in this one, I apologize for the inconvenience.
## Changes
### Bug Fixes
- Fixed and streamlined total power calculation
- Fixed item creation ignoring changed classifications
0.10.2-beta.title: 0.10.2 Beta

0.10.3-beta.description:
[Game Info](https://github.com/MaxReinstadler/X2WOTCArchipelago/blob/main/worlds/x2wotc/docs/en_XCOM%202%20War%20of%20the%20Chosen.md) | [Setup Guide](https://github.com/MaxReinstadler/X2WOTCArchipelago/blob/main/worlds/x2wotc/docs/setup_en.md) | [Troubleshooting](https://github.com/MaxReinstadler/X2WOTCArchipelago/blob/main/worlds/x2wotc/docs/troubleshooting.md)
## Changes
### Modding Support
- Item and location data `tags` fields have been changed from `list[str]` to `set[str]`
- Filler items are now expected to be manually added to the item manager in `generate_early`
  - This means mods can now specify whether items are `resource_items`, `weapon_mod_items`, `staff_items` or even `trap_items`
  - See [`/mods/example/__init__.py`](https://github.com/MaxReinstadler/X2WOTCArchipelago/blob/main/worlds/x2wotc/mods/example/__init__.py#L25) for example usage
### Bug Fixes
- Fixed generation logic (which was broken in 0.10.2)
0.10.3-beta.title: 0.10.3 Beta

0.10.4-beta.description:
[Game Info](https://github.com/MaxReinstadler/X2WOTCArchipelago/blob/main/worlds/x2wotc/docs/en_XCOM%202%20War%20of%20the%20Chosen.md) | [Setup Guide](https://github.com/MaxReinstadler/X2WOTCArchipelago/blob/main/worlds/x2wotc/docs/setup_en.md) | [Troubleshooting](https://github.com/MaxReinstadler/X2WOTCArchipelago/blob/main/worlds/x2wotc/docs/troubleshooting.md)
## Changes
### New Items
- Added basic, advanced and superior PCS items
  - Set which portion of the filler pool they will occupy with the `PCS Share` option
- Added basic weapon upgrade items
- Added nothing item (it does nothing)
  - You can now constrain the number of resource items with the `Resource Share` option
### Miscellaneous
- Updated Chosen weapon fragment names for clarity
- Slight tweak to power calculation that should improve logic with non-empty `start_inventory`
### Bug Fixes
- Fixed launching the client via command line argument
  - Shortcuts for launching the client and immediately connecting should now work
0.10.4-beta.title: 0.10.4 Beta

0.10.5-beta.description:
[Game Info](https://github.com/MaxReinstadler/X2WOTCArchipelago/blob/main/worlds/x2wotc/docs/en_XCOM%202%20War%20of%20the%20Chosen.md) | [Setup Guide](https://github.com/MaxReinstadler/X2WOTCArchipelago/blob/main/worlds/x2wotc/docs/setup_en.md) | [Troubleshooting](https://github.com/MaxReinstadler/X2WOTCArchipelago/blob/main/worlds/x2wotc/docs/troubleshooting.md)
## Changes
### Long War of the Chosen
- Added mod support for Long War of the Chosen (by @copyrite)
  - Simply add `'Long War of the Chosen'` to the `active_mods` option and enable the mod when launching the game!
  - New items as well as research, enemy and item locations are supported
  - Enemy Rando is incompatible (and will be ignored if the mod is active)
### New Options
- Enable instant rookie training in the GTS with new `Instant Rookie Training` option
  - Can be changed in-game via MCM
- Added functionality for core `start_inventory_from_pool` option
### Miscellaneous
- Reworked filler item options to work like weights
  - Added new `Nothing Share` option to allow for limiting the number of filler items
- Added option groups for improved yaml readability
- Added `workshop_path` setting to `host.yaml` for cases where the Steam workshop is in a different place from the game
  - If the mod is not found on one of the expected paths, the client will prompt the user to provide this path
0.10.5-beta.title: 0.10.5 Beta

0.4.0-alpha.description:
[Game Info](https://github.com/MaxReinstadler/X2WOTCArchipelago/blob/main/worlds/x2wotc/docs/en_XCOM%202%20War%20of%20the%20Chosen.md) | [Setup Guide](https://github.com/MaxReinstadler/X2WOTCArchipelago/blob/main/worlds/x2wotc/docs/setup_en.md)

### Changes
- Added optional campaign completion requirements (by default, any of the three will unlock the final mission)
  - Completing Psi Gate research objectives
  - Completing Stasis Suit research objectives
  - Acquiring an Avatar corpse
- Added `/version` command to print installed client version
- Simplified options file
- Balance changes
0.4.0-alpha.title: 0.4.0 Alpha

0.5.0-alpha.description:
[Game Info](https://github.com/MaxReinstadler/X2WOTCArchipelago/blob/main/worlds/x2wotc/docs/en_XCOM%202%20War%20of%20the%20Chosen.md) | [Setup Guide](https://github.com/MaxReinstadler/X2WOTCArchipelago/blob/main/worlds/x2wotc/docs/setup_en.md)

## Changes

### New Locations & Items
- Chosen Hunt Covert Actions + Unlocks
  - Includes Resistance Faction Influence and Chosen Stronghold Missions

### New Filler Items
- *New Resource:* Ability Points
- *Added Staff:* Scientist, Engineer
- *Added Traps:* Avatar Project Progress, Force Level Increase

### New Options
- Toggle chosen hunt locations with `Chosen Hunt-Sanity` option
- Adjust rates of weapon upgrade, staff and trap items with `Weapon Mod Share`, `Staff Share` and `Trap Share` options
0.5.0-alpha.title: 0.5.0 Alpha

0.6.0-alpha.description:
[Game Info](https://github.com/MaxReinstadler/X2WOTCArchipelago/blob/main/worlds/x2wotc/docs/en_XCOM%202%20War%20of%20the%20Chosen.md) | [Setup Guide](https://github.com/MaxReinstadler/X2WOTCArchipelago/blob/main/worlds/x2wotc/docs/setup_en.md)

## Changes

### New Locations
- First Item Use
  - Includes Ammo, Grenades, Utility Items and Heavy Weapons
  - For balance, there is a new in-game setting to increase the amount of corpses gained for each kill (+1 by default)

### New Options
- Toggle enemy kill locations with `Enemysanity` option
- Toggle item use locations with `Itemsanity` options

### Miscellaneous
- Added Universal Tracker integration to client (no back compat, the client now requires AP 0.5.1)
- Fixed incorrect use of the random module in `Items.py`
- Fixed a bug in logic for multiple XCOM 2 players with different options (oops)
0.6.0-alpha.title: 0.6.0 Alpha

0.7.0-alpha.description:
[Game Info](https://github.com/MaxReinstadler/X2WOTCArchipelago/blob/main/worlds/x2wotc/docs/en_XCOM%202%20War%20of%20the%20Chosen.md) | [Setup Guide](https://github.com/MaxReinstadler/X2WOTCArchipelago/blob/main/worlds/x2wotc/docs/setup_en.md)
## Changes
### New Option
- Change goal with `Goal` option
  - Choices are `alien_fortress` (beating the final mission), `network_tower` (beating the second to last mission), `chosen_stronghold_1`, `chosen_stronghold_2` and `chosen_stronghold_3` (beating 1, 2 or 3 Chosen strongholds)
### Miscellaneous
- Fixed generation logic for the `Use Skulljack` location
0.7.0-alpha.title: 0.7.0 Alpha

### Miscellaneous
- Enabled Universal Tracker client integration to work without requiring a `yaml` file

## Changes
### New Option
- Force proving ground to be available early with `Early Proving Ground` option

### Miscellaneous

  - Resistance Communications and Resistance Radio locations are now always disabled

0.8.0-beta.description:
[Game Info](https://github.com/MaxReinstadler/X2WOTCArchipelago/blob/main/worlds/x2wotc/docs/en_XCOM%202%20War%20of%20the%20Chosen.md) | [Setup Guide](https://github.com/MaxReinstadler/X2WOTCArchipelago/blob/main/worlds/x2wotc/docs/setup_en.md) | [Troubleshooting](https://github.com/MaxReinstadler/X2WOTCArchipelago/blob/main/worlds/x2wotc/docs/troubleshooting.md)

This release is tagged as beta—don't take that to mean "feature-complete" or that drastic changes won't happen. My main intent is to signal that the framework is there, including many features that I've been viewing as essential, and that I've generally heard from players that the implementation is stable.
## Changes
### Mod Support
- You can now implement apworld support for other mods without changing any existing code!
- Mods can introduce their own locations, items, options, and logic, as well as override logic for base-game locations
  - Add new research projects, enemies and items as checks by editing the game mod's [`XComWOTCArchipelago.ini`](https://github.com/MaxReinstadler/WOTCArchipelago/blob/main/WOTCArchipelago/Config/XComWOTCArchipelago.ini)
- Check out [`x2wotc/mods/`](https://github.com/MaxReinstadler/X2WOTCArchipelago/tree/main/worlds/x2wotc/mods) for a simple example and two functional implementations of the [Flame Viper](https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1160638944) and [Muton Destroyer](https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2482812108) mods
- Toggle active mods with the `Active Mods` option
- List installed and active mods in the client with the `/mods` command
### Bugfix
- Fixed a crash introduced by the MCM reset button
0.8.0-beta.title: 0.8.0 Beta

0.8.1-beta.description:
[Game Info](https://github.com/MaxReinstadler/X2WOTCArchipelago/blob/main/worlds/x2wotc/docs/en_XCOM%202%20War%20of%20the%20Chosen.md) | [Setup Guide](https://github.com/MaxReinstadler/X2WOTCArchipelago/blob/main/worlds/x2wotc/docs/setup_en.md) | [Troubleshooting](https://github.com/MaxReinstadler/X2WOTCArchipelago/blob/main/worlds/x2wotc/docs/troubleshooting.md)
## Changes
### Mod Support
- Reworked code structure and modding API, [see how it's used](https://github.com/MaxReinstadler/X2WOTCArchipelago/tree/main/worlds/x2wotc) for base-game features or the example mod implementations
  - Check out [the commit](https://github.com/MaxReinstadler/X2WOTCArchipelago/commit/79fca8a7a6f8c9e7c37c5102a416d608ddb21cab) for a list of changes
0.8.1-beta.title: 0.8.1 Beta

0.9.0-beta.description:
[Game Info](https://github.com/MaxReinstadler/X2WOTCArchipelago/blob/main/worlds/x2wotc/docs/en_XCOM%202%20War%20of%20the%20Chosen.md) | [Setup Guide](https://github.com/MaxReinstadler/X2WOTCArchipelago/blob/main/worlds/x2wotc/docs/setup_en.md) | [Troubleshooting](https://github.com/MaxReinstadler/X2WOTCArchipelago/blob/main/worlds/x2wotc/docs/troubleshooting.md)
## Changes
### Config Settings
- Added options for setting config defaults to yaml
  - Defaults are written to the config file upon connection by the client
  - Config settings can still be changed in-game via MCM
  - The client may require you to set the path to your installation of XCOM 2, which it stores in `host.yaml`
- Removed config settings for proxy port and campaign completion requirements, which should never differ from the client's view
  - The client will automatically write the new proxy port to the config file when it is updated
### Mod Support
- Added `/install_mod` client command to automatically install a mod to the apworld (in the form of a `.py` or `.zip` file)
- Added `/clear_mods` client command to automatically remove all mods from the apworld
- The client now automatically adds entries for mod-added checks to the config file upon connection
  - For modders: check out the [existing examples](https://github.com/MaxReinstadler/X2WOTCArchipelago/tree/main/worlds/x2wotc/mods) to see how it works
- Added functionality for ignoring enemies' default character group when it comes to kill checks ([commit](https://github.com/MaxReinstadler/WOTCArchipelago/commit/f3a8ea695797489740f0cfd3cc58234c0f64facd))
### Miscellaneous
- Added functionality for item and location groups (yaml/client)
- Improved logging for the game mod, including checks for version compatibility with the client
### Bugfix
- Fixed a bug where the wrong items could be received too many times
0.9.0-beta.title: 0.9.0 Beta

0.9.1-beta.description:
[Game Info](https://github.com/MaxReinstadler/X2WOTCArchipelago/blob/main/worlds/x2wotc/docs/en_XCOM%202%20War%20of%20the%20Chosen.md) | [Setup Guide](https://github.com/MaxReinstadler/X2WOTCArchipelago/blob/main/worlds/x2wotc/docs/setup_en.md) | [Troubleshooting](https://github.com/MaxReinstadler/X2WOTCArchipelago/blob/main/worlds/x2wotc/docs/troubleshooting.md)
## Changes
### Miscellaneous
- Added item groups for progressive items
  - This should make hinting progressive items more intuitive
- The client now recognizes the game mod when it is manually installed in `Mods/3281191663/` (Steam workshop ID)
  - Previously, the only recognized path was `Mods/WOTCArchipelago/`
0.9.1-beta.title: 0.9.1 Beta

0.9.2-beta.description:
[Game Info](https://github.com/MaxReinstadler/X2WOTCArchipelago/blob/main/worlds/x2wotc/docs/en_XCOM%202%20War%20of%20the%20Chosen.md) | [Setup Guide](https://github.com/MaxReinstadler/X2WOTCArchipelago/blob/main/worlds/x2wotc/docs/setup_en.md) | [Troubleshooting](https://github.com/MaxReinstadler/X2WOTCArchipelago/blob/main/worlds/x2wotc/docs/troubleshooting.md)
## Changes
### Bugfixes
- Fixed generation failures due to excessive progressive item counts
- Removed progressive item groups that were causing test failures
